      • getById

        public static Project getById(int id)
                       throws DaoException
        Get a project by his id. If the project has a parent, select also the parent
        Parameters:
        id - project's id
        Returns:
        the project with the given id
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • checkExistingProject

        public static int checkExistingProject(java.lang.String projectName,
                                       java.time.LocalDate endDate)
                                throws DaoException
        Check for an existing project in the database according to the unique fields of a project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the project name
        endDate - the end date of the project
        Returns:
        the ID of the project in the DB or -1 if he is not in the DB
        Throws:
        DaoException - if an sqlException occurs.

        Throws:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
